lead_paragraph: Barcelona forward Neymar, his parents and two of the club's executives should stand trial for alleged corruption, Spain's High Court said on Monday as it wrapped up a fraud investigation into the Brazil international's transfer to the Catalan team.

headline.print_headline: Spanish Court Wants Neymar Trial Over Barcelona Transfer
headline.main: Spanish Court Wants Neymar Trial Over Barcelona Transfer
